multiplechoiceresponse.label: You are a Project manager in a Multinational company. A project is starting to create a dedicated team responsible for booking the business trips of the employees – flights, hotels, etc. You are planning quality and you learn from the managers that they are often given a very short notice for their travels – sometimes even for the next day. You need to define a measurable metric to check that the quality requirement is being met. What metric should you use in this case?

choicegroup.choice: The time between sending the request to the team and their response with specific quotations (flights, hotels)The client of the project (employees travelling regularly) have highlighted that the trips must be booked quickly. Hence, this should be the most important requirement to be met. The suggested metric monitors exactly this – the time to respond to a request.
The minimum number of options given for flights and for hotels
The business language used by the assistance team in the e-mail back to the employee
